[`Vault`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault.md) â€º [`process`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault/process.md)

## Vault.process() method

Atomically read, modify, and save the contents of a note.

**Signature:**

```typescript
process(file: TFile, fn: (data: string) => string, options?: DataWriteOptions): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | [`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md) | the file to be read and modified. |
|  <code>fn</code> | <code>(data: string) =&gt; string</code> | a callback function which returns the new content of the note synchronously. |
|  <code>options</code> | [`DataWriteOptions`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataWriteOptions.md) | _(Optional)_ write options. |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<string>`

string - the text value of the note that was written.

## Example


```ts
app.vault.process(file, (data) => {
 return data.replace('Hello', 'World');
});
```
